resources.string: Location permission is needed for core functionality.
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.

Please DO NOT revoke the permissions for this app. We need to calculate your location accurately and in case of possible vulnerability, we will inform you over email. We anonymously analyse location data and when a person is reported to be infected, we notify his\/her close connections for possibility of infection. Over next week, we will update the app to add more features.
